Report.Name: Logon: Top Firewall Admin Users Ranked By Successful Logon
Report.Description: Top Firewall Admin Users Ranked By Successful Logon Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Top Firewall Admin Users Ranked By Failed Logon
Report.Description: This report describes failed admin logon to a firewall

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Logon: Successful Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess))

Report.Name: Logon: Failed Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure))

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Firewalls By Denies
Report.Description: Top Firewalls Ranked By Total Blocked Connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Firewalls By Inbound Denies
Report.Description: Top Firewalls Ranked By Total Blocked Inbound Connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Firewalls By Outbound Denies
Report.Description: Top Firewalls Ranked By Total Blocked Outbound Connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL))

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Sources By Connection Count
Report.Description: Top Blocked Sources Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Sources, Ports By Connection Count
Report.Description: Top Blocked Sources Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Destinations By Connection Count
Report.Description: Top Blocked Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Internal Sources, Ports By Connection Count
Report.Description: Top Blocked Internal Sources Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Internal Sources, Ports, Destinations
Report.Description: Top Blocked Internal Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Internal Destinations By Connection Count
Report.Description: Top Blocked Internal Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Internal Destinations,Ports By Connection Count
Report.Description: Top Blocked Internal Destinations, Services Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_15
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewalls By Total Permitted Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by the total number of permitted connections and the number of exchanged bytes. This answers the question: which firewall handles the most traffic

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewalls Ranked By Inbound Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by the total number of permitted inbound connections and exchanged bytes. This answers the question: which firewall answers the most inbound traffic.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_17
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewalls By Total Outbound Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by the total number of permitted outbound connections and exchanged bytes. This answers the question: which firewall answers the most outbound traffic.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_18
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Ports By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks permitted ports through that firewall by first the total number of connections and then by the bytes used by that service

SubPattern.name: FIlter_FW_19
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Ports By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Inbound Ports By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Internal Sources By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Top Internal Sources By Total Permitted Connections, Bytes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_22
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Conversations By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Top Internal Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Total Permitted Connections, Bytes

SelectClause.AttrList: srcIpAddr,srcName,ipProto, destIpPort, destIpAddr,destName, COUNT(*), SUM(sentBytes), SUM(recvBytes), SUM (totBytes)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_23
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top External Sources By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Top External Sources Ranked By Total Permitted Connections, Bytes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Inbound Conversations By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Top External Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Total Permitted Connections, Bytes

SelectClause.AttrList: srcIpAddr,srcName,ipProto, destIpPort, destIpAddr,destName, COUNT(*), SUM(sentBytes), SUM(recvBytes), SUM (totBytes)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_25
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Internal Destinations, Ports By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Top External Destinations and Services Ranked By Total Permitted Connections, Bytes

SelectClause.AttrList: destIpAddr,destName,ipProto, destIpPort, COUNT(*), SUM(sentBytes), SUM(recvBytes), SUM (totBytes)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Inbound Conversations By Count, Bytes
Report.Description: Top Inbound Permitted Connections Ranked By Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Inbound Connections By Count
Report.Description: Top Inbound Denied Connections Ranked By Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Conversations By Count
Report.Description: Top Inbound Permitted Connections Ranked By Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Deny: Top Blocked Outbound Connections By Count
Report.Description: Top Blocked Outbound Connections Ranked By Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: All Events: Top Reporting Firewalls By Event Count
Report.Description: This report ranks the firewalls by the number of events sent

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: All Events: Top Firewall Events By Count
Report.Description: This report ranks the firewalls events by count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: NAT Translations
Report.Description: This report captures the NAT translations over a time window

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_32
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-302013","ASA-302015", "PIX-302013","PIX-302015","FWSM-302013","FWSM-302015","CheckPoint-permit traffic","Juniper-SSG-traffic-permit","FortiGate-traffic-allowed")

Report.Name: Errors: Firewall Operational Errors
Report.Description: This report captures firewall operational errors

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_33
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Error)

Report.Name: Logon: Firewall Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about firewall admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_34
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff)

Report.Name: Change: Firewall Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG"

Report.Name: Change: Firewall Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG")

Report.Name: Exploit: Attacks Blocked by Firewall
Report.Description: This report captures attacks blocked by a firewall

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventAction = 1 AND eventType NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Info)

Report.Name: Exploit: Top Inbound Scanned Ports By Count
Report.Description: This report ranked the ports by the number of denied distinct source IPs

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventAction = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound High Port Conversations By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Reports the outbound conversations on high (i.e. greater than 1024) destination ports ranked by the volume of permitted high port services - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (destIpPort > 1024) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewalls By Outbound High Ports Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (destIpPort > 1024) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound High Port Talkers Ranked By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks the sources that communicate over the firewall by high ports by the total traffic transferred - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (destIpPort > 1024) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Uncommon Port Conversations By Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Uncommon Port Talkers By Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Vulnerable Low Port Conversations By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Vulnerable Low Ports By Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Vulnerable Low Port Talkers By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks the sources that transfer the most bytes using traditionally vulnerable protocols including Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: All Traffic: Top Distinct-Destination-Host Talkers Ranked By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks the sources by the number of distinct destination hosts that the source communicates with

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: All Traffic: Top Distinct-Destination-Port Talkers Ranked By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks the sources by the number of distinct destination ports that the source communicates on

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewalls By Inbound Connections
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls by permitted inbound Connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewalls By Inbound Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls by average number of bytes per connection

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Inbound Ports By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by the total number of connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Inbound Ports By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by the average bytes per connection

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewalls By Outbound Connections
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls by the total number of permitted outbound connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Firewalls By Outbound Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls by the average bytes per connection for outbound connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Ports By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by the total number of connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top Outbound Ports By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by the average number of bytes per connection

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Performance: Top Firewalls By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average cpu utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_CPU_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: Performance: Top Firewalls By Connection Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average connection count over a window. The ratio of the connection count to the max connection count since startup is also provided. If the ratio is close 1 and the firewall is up for a long time, the the firewall must be busy from a firewalled connection point of view.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_FW_CONN_UTIL"

Report.Name: Performance: Top Firewall Network Intf By Util, Error, Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls and their network interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: Performance: Top Firewalls By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: Availability: Ping Monitor Statistics
Report.Description: Tracks the PING response times and packet loss for the monitored devices

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_17
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: Availability: Firewall Network Interface Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks network device interface down and up events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL))

Report.Name: Availability: Firewall Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks network device down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL))

Report.Name: Availability: Network Device Failover
Report.Description: Tracks network device failovers

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Failover) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL))

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top non-(TCP,UDP) Protocols By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall permitted non-TCP/UDP protocols by the number of received connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: ipProto != 17 AND ipProto != 6 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top non-TCP/UDP Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks firewall permitted source IP, destination IP, non-TCP/UDP ports, and event types first by event severity and then by event count

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: ipProto != 17 AND ipProto != 6 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top ICMP Connections By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks source IP, destination IP, reporting devices and event types for permitted ICMP connections, first by event severity and then by event count.

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: ipProto =1 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic)
SubPattern.GroupByAttr: srcIpAddr,srcName, destIpAddr,destName, ipProto, icmpType, icmpCode, eventType,eventSeverity
